mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OCR_INFO ( SEQ, SAVE_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_PATH, ORG_FILE_NAME, EXT, OCR_TEXT, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM OCR_INFO), #{save_file_name}, #{save_file_path}, #{org_file_name}, #{ext}, #{ocr_text}, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE )
